snippet: The teenage soldier was being debriefed after he arrived at a guard post in the South Korean half of the Demilitarized Zone, the Defense Ministry said.
abstract: Teenage soldier is first North Korean serviceman to defect to South Korea in three years, crossing border near Hwacheon; cites widespread beatings and other military abuses as reason for defecting.
lead_paragraph: The teenage soldier was being debriefed after he arrived at a guard post in the South Korean half of the Demilitarized Zone, the Defense Ministry said.

headline.main: North Korean Soldier Braves DMZ to Defect to South
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North Korea: Soldier Defects, Citing Abuse in Military
